2.title: China Trip
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Candid footage of Emilee on foot in the destination with guests, interior shots of venue, interviews, exterior landscapes, wildlife, cuisine, and local culture. Each episode will have portions devoted to different ingredients, treatments, and ancient cultural practices. The audience will feel rejuvenated after each episode and inspired by the hidden places on Earth and amazed by the different cultural beauty rituals
imdb.title: Bizarre Beauty
plot: Educating people about aesthetics, beauty, diet, history, and culture.::Emilee Wilson
